nodes.text: The father of Commander Zhou was a male individual who served the Galactic Empire and was the superior of his son. While posted as commanding officer at Fekunda Outpost, Zhou feared that his father would order his forces to abandon the outpost if he could not prove that it was capable of producing sufficient grain.

Zhou's father was first mentioned in the third issue of the 2018 Star Wars: Forces of Destiny comic series. Though not stated within the comic itself, artist Eva Widermann confirmed on social media that the photographs seen in Zhou's room were meant to be his father and mother. The photograph showed Zhou's father as a human man in Imperial uniform with a dark beard.
